Spanish (Latin America).Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Spanish (Latin America).Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Sodium hypochlorite bleach. Sanitizing applications.
Spanish (Latin America).Tooltip_CoralChunk: Sample containing CaCO₃. Calcium carbonate is a base ingredient for bleach.

Bulgarian.Goal_Bleach: Белината е химическо вещество, използвано за почистване на рани и пречистване на вода.
Bulgarian.Tooltip_Bleach: Натриева хипохлоритна белина. За санитарно приложение.
Bulgarian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Проба, съдържаща калциев карбонат. Той е основна съставка на белината.

Czech.Goal_Bleach: Bělidlo je důležitou chemikálií používanou pro čištění ran a vody.
Czech.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Chlornan sodný pro desinfekci a čištění.
Czech.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Vzorek obsahuje CaCO₃. Uhličitan vápenatý je základní složka pro výrobu desinfekce.

Turkish.Goal_Bleach: Ağartıcı, yaraları temizlemek ve suyu saflaştırmak için temel bir kimyasaldır.
Turkish.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Sodyum hipoklorit ağartıcı. Arındırıcı olarak kullanılır.
Turkish.Tooltip_CoralChunk: CaCO₃ içeren örnek. Kalsiyum karbonat, ağartıcının temel bir bileşenidir.

Spanish.Goal_Bleach: El cloro es un químico esencial usado para limpiar heridas y purificar el agua.
Spanish.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Hipoclorito de sodio. Tiene aplicaciones desinfectantes.
Spanish.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Muestra que contiene CaCO₃. El carbonato de calcio es un ingrediente básico para el cloro.

Slovenian.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Slovenian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Sodium hypochlorite bleach. Sanitizing applications.
Slovenian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Sample containing CaCO₃. Calcium carbonate is a base ingredient for bleach.

Japanese.CoralChunk: コーラルチューブのサンプル
Japanese.Goal_Bleach: 漂白剤は傷口の消毒や水の浄化に必須の化学素材です。
Japanese.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO。次亜塩素酸ナトリウム漂白剤。消毒に使用する。
Japanese.Tooltip_CoralChunk: CaCO₃を含むサンプル。炭酸カルシウムは漂白剤の基礎原料。

Dutch.Goal_Bleach: Bleekmiddel is van groot belang voor het zuiveren van water en desinfecteren van wonden.
Dutch.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Natriumhypochloriet bleekmiddel dat voor desinfecteren gebruikt kan worden.
Dutch.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Specimen dat CaCO₃  bevat. Calciumcarbonaat is een basisingrediënt voor bleekmiddel.

Romanian.Goal_Bleach: Clorul este o chimicală esențială folosită pentru curățarea rănilor si purificarea apei.
Romanian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaCIO. Înalbitor de hipoclorit de sodiu. Utilizări sanitare.
Romanian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Mostră ce conține CaCO₃. Carbonatul de calciu este elementul de bază pentru înălbitor.

German.Goal_Bleach: Chlorbleiche ist eine wichtige Chemikalie zur Wundreinigung und Wasseraufbereitung.
German.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Natriumhypochlorit-Bleiche. Wird zur Desinfektion verwendet.
German.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Eine Probe, die CaCO₃ enthält. Kalziumkarbonat ist ein Grundbestandteil der Chlorbleiche.

Estonian.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Estonian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Sodium hypochlorite bleach. Sanitizing applications.
Estonian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Sample containing CaCO₃. Calcium carbonate is a base ingredient for bleach.

Greek.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Greek.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Υποχλωριώδες νάτριο. Εφαρμογές σε απολύμανση.
Greek.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Δείγμα που περιέχει CaCO₃. Το ανθρακικό ασβέστιο είναι βασικό συστατικό για χλωρίνη.

Danish.Goal_Bleach: Desinficeringsmiddel er et vigtigt element for at rense sår og fremstille drikkevand.
Danish.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Prøve der indeholder CaCO₃. Kalciumkarbonat er en hovedingrediens i desinficeringsmiddel.

Latvian.Goal_Bleach: Balinātājs ir būtiska ūdens attīrīšanas un brūču tīrīšanas ķimikālija.
Latvian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Nātrija hipohlorīta balinātājs. Sanitāri pelietojumi.
Latvian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: CaCO₃ saturošs paraugs. Kalcija karbonāts ir balinātāja pamatsastāvdaļa.

Portuguese (Brazil).Goal_Bleach: O alvejante é um componente essencial para a limpeza de feridas e purificação da água.
Portuguese (Brazil).Tooltip_Bleach: NaCIO. Alvejante de hipocloreto de sódio. Aplicações desinfetantes.
Portuguese (Brazil).Tooltip_CoralChunk: Amostra contendo CaCO₃. Carbonato de cálcio é um ingrediente base para alvejante.

Portuguese.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Portuguese.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Sodium hypochlorite bleach. Sanitizing applications.
Portuguese.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Sample containing CaCO₃. Calcium carbonate is a base ingredient for bleach.

Afrikaans.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Afrikaans.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Sodium hypochlorite bleach. Sanitizing applications.
Afrikaans.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Sample containing CaCO₃. Calcium carbonate is a base ingredient for bleach.

Irish.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Irish.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Sodium hypochlorite bleach. Sanitizing applications.
Irish.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Sample containing CaCO₃. Calcium carbonate is a base ingredient for bleach.

English.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
English.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Sodium hypochlorite bleach. Sanitizing applications.
English.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Sample containing CaCO₃. Calcium carbonate is a base ingredient for bleach.

Italian.Goal_Bleach: Il cloro è un elemento chimico essenziale per pulire le ferite e purificare l'acqua.
Italian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Campione contenente CaCO3. Il carbonato di calcio è un ingrediente essenziale per ottenere il cloro.

Finnish.Goal_Bleach: Valkaisuaine on tarpeellinen kemikaali, jota käytetään haavojen ja veden puhdistamiseen.
Finnish.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Näyte, joka sisältää CaCO₃:ta. Kalsiumkarbonaatti on valkaisuaineen pääainesosa.

Ukrainian.Goal_Bleach: Знезаражувач – важлива хімічна сполука для загоєння ран і очищення води.
Ukrainian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Гіпохлорит натрію. Знищує шкідливі мікроорганізми.
Ukrainian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Взірець містить CaCO₃ – вуглекислий кальцій – який є основним складником знезаражувача.

Norwegian.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Norwegian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Prøve som inneholder CaCO₃. Kalsiumkarbonat er en grunnleggende ingrediens i blekemiddel.

Polish.Goal_Bleach: Utleniacz jest niezbędnym składnikiem chemicznym używanym do odkażania ran i wody.
Polish.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Utleniacz z podchlorynu sodu. Stosowany przy dezynfekcji.
Polish.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Próbka zawierająca CaCO₃. Węglan wapnia jest podstawowym składnikiem utleniacza.

Serbian.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Serbian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Sodium hypochlorite bleach. Sanitizing applications.
Serbian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Sample containing CaCO₃. Calcium carbonate is a base ingredient for bleach.

French.Goal_Bleach: La javel est un produit chimique indispensable pour nettoyer les blessures et purifier l'eau.
French.Tooltip_Bleach: Javel d'hypochlorite de sodium (NaClO). Pour utilisations sanitaires.
French.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Échantillon contenant du CaCO₃. Le carbonate de calcium est un ingrédient de base pour la javel.

Hungarian.Goal_Bleach: A fehérítő nélkülözhetetlen vegyszer, amelyet sebek tisztítására és víz fertőtlenítésére használnak.
Hungarian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Nátrium-hipoklorit fehérítő. Fertőtlenítőként való alkalmazáshoz.
Hungarian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: A minta CaCO ³-at tartalmaz. A kalcium-karbonát a fehérítő egyik alapvető összetevője.

Thai.CoralChunk: ตัวอย่าง ท่อปะการัง
Thai.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Thai.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO สารฟอกขาวโซเดียมไฮโปคลอไรท์ ใช้สำหรับฆ่าเชื้อ
Thai.Tooltip_CoralChunk: ตัวอย่างที่มี CaCO₃ เป็นส่วนประกอบ แคลเซียมคาร์บอเนตเป็นส่วนผสมหลักสำหรับสารฟอกขาว

Lithuanian.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Lithuanian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Natrio hipochlorito baliklis. Dezinfekuojantis elementas.
Lithuanian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Mėginys, turintis CaCO₃. Kalcio karbonatas yra pagrindinis ingridientas gaminant baliklį.

Croatian.Goal_Bleach: Bleach is an essential chemical used for cleaning wounds and purifying water.
Croatian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Izbjeljivač na bazi natrijevog hipoklorita. Sterilizacijska primjena.
Croatian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Uzorak sadržava CaCO₃. Kalcijev karbonat je osnovni sastojak izbjeljivača.

Swedish.Goal_Bleach: Blekmedel är en väsentlig kemikalie för att rengöra sår och rena vatten.
Swedish.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Prov innehållande CaCO₃. Kalciumkarbonat är en grundläggande ingrediens i blekningsmedel.

Russian.Goal_Bleach: Антисептик является важным химическим веществом, используемым для очистки ран и дезинфекции воды.
Russian.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Антисептик из гипохлорита натрия. Применяется для санобработки.
Russian.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Образец содержит CaCO₃. Карбонат кальция — основной ингредиент в производстве антисептика.

Chinese (Simplified).Goal_Bleach: 碳酸钙制造的漂白剂: 被发现,漂白剂是用于清洁伤口和净化水的基本化学药品。
Chinese (Simplified).Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO。次氯酸钠漂白剂。用于对液体进行消毒。
Chinese (Simplified).Tooltip_CoralChunk: 含碳酸钙，是制作漂白剂的基本原料之一。

Slovak.Goal_Bleach: Bielidlo je dôležitá chemikália na čistenie vody a rán.
Slovak.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Vzorka obsahuje CaCO₃. Uhličitan vápenatý je základná zložka bielidla.

Vietnamese.Goal_Bleach: Chất tẩy là nguyên tố hóa học chính được sử dụng để làm sạch vết thương và khử trùng nước.
Vietnamese.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. Chất tẩy natri hypoclorit. Ứng dụng vệ sinh.
Vietnamese.Tooltip_CoralChunk: Mẫu vật chứa CaCO₃. Canxi cacbonat là thành phần cơ bản của thuốc tẩy.

Korean.Goal_Bleach: 표백제는 물을 정화하고 상처를 치료하는 데 쓰이는 필수 화학 물질입니다.
Korean.Tooltip_Bleach: NaClO. 염소산나트륨계 표백제입니다. 각종 살균처리에 사용됩니다.
Korean.Tooltip_CoralChunk: CaCO₃를 포함하고 있습니다. 탄산 칼슘은 표백제의 기본 재료입니다.
